article_title: GOP taps Dutchess legislator for Assembly, Blasl for coroner
article_text:
Current Register Star Subscribers

Web Access Subscriptions are non-refundable. You must have an active print subscription to qualify for the reduced subscriber only rates.

To subscribe with another form of payment other than a credit card, please contact: cgmdigitalpass@registerstar.com

og.description: The Columbia County Republican Committee nominated candidates for the only two county-wide open seats it doesn’t already hold title to Monday. Dutchess County real estate agent and Fourth District Legislator Sue Serino was picked to oppose Assemblywoman Didi Barrett, D-Hudson, and Chatham funeral home owner Michael Blasl will take on County Coroner Roberta Davis.
